author: Daniel Greene
description:
Pluribus is (IMO) the best streaming show of 2025, SO LET'S TALK ABOUT IT! From its eerie atmosphere and deliberate pacing to its unsettling themes and confident storytelling, Pluribus is doing something most modern shows simply don’t attempt: patience. 

This isn’t just another prestige sci-fi series. Pluribus trusts its audience, builds tension through implication rather than exposition, and commits fully to its tone. In an era of over-explained television, this show feels bold, strange, and refreshingly confident.

title: Pluribus Is the Best Sci-Fi Show of 2025
